titleproper.value: Guide to the Isaac Allen Papers <num>MC 221</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-01-23T15:05:34</date>

abstract.value: Isaac Allen attended courses related to architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century. Materials include four textbooks related to architecture and architectural drawing.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Isaac Allen Papers; MC 221; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number related to this collection is 10.036.
Isaac Allen attended courses related to architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century.

Materials include four textbooks related to architecture and architectural drawing that were used by Isaac Allen while studying architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century. Allen inscribed his name in a few of the books.
